node.excerpt: I attended DevNexus 2019! This Java conference has been held yearly in Atlanta for quite a few years now.  It was great to explore a new city (albeit lightly), hang out amongst a lot of other software…

Built a new blog with Gatsby.js and a great starter. Here I plan to do book
reviews, tech posts, and much more!  A little bit about me! I am a software developer currently working in Norman, OK. I…
